description:
This talk is about a love story.
The perfect love between PostgreSQL and Python.

PostgreSQL is the default database choice for many Python developers,
because it is robust, stable and open source. In 2ndQuadrant, we
breathe PostgreSQL and we love python too, using it as much as
possible for internal and external open source projects. We want to
share our love for python and PostgreSQL and how they work together.
So let us tell you a real love story!
title: PostgreSQL and Python, a match made in heaven
